tasks.title: Add TESTER agent + enforce post-CODER testing
tasks.description:
Add a new TESTER specialist agent responsible for adding automated test coverage for code changes. Wire the workflow so development-oriented plans always schedule TESTER after CODER before REVIEWER, and update CODER instructions to explicitly hand off to TESTER after implementation/self-check.

Acceptance criteria:
- New @.AGENTS/TESTER.json exists (id=TESTER) with clear inputs/outputs/permissions/workflow for adding/maintaining tests.
- @.AGENTS/CODER.json explicitly hands off to TESTER for test coverage after implementation and local checks.
- @AGENTS.md updates ORCHESTRATOR rules so dev tasks plan CODER -> TESTER -> REVIEWER by default (unless justified).
- @README.md reflects the new agent in the lineup and repository layout.

Notes:
- Prefer existing test framework; if none, propose a dedicated task to introduce test infrastructure rather than inventing one ad-hoc.

tasks.title: Require DOCS workflow artifact before finishing tasks
tasks.description:
Change DOCS agent behavior so it runs before finishing any task and produces an atomic documentation artifact under @docs/workflow (e.g., @docs/workflow/T-025.md) describing what was implemented. Update orchestration guidance so plans include DOCS before REVIEWER marks tasks DONE.

Acceptance criteria:
- @docs/workflow directory exists and is committed (with a short README describing artifact convention).
- @.AGENTS/DOCS.json instructs producing @docs/workflow/T-###.md artifacts (English, atomic, task-scoped).
- @AGENTS.md ORCHESTRATOR guidance schedules DOCS before finishing any task (DOCS before REVIEWER finish).

Notes:
- Artifacts must be task-ID named, contain summary + changed files + verification commands (when available).
